translation.en: What's up, people?
Welcome to The Marlon Way.
I'm Marlon.
Good news!
We just hit six million subscribers!
I woke up this morning at 5:15 a.m.,
and I thought to myself,
"Why am I up so early?"
But more importantly, "Why am I the only one up this early?"
translation.ko: 무엇보다 왜 나만 이렇게 일찍 일어나야 하지?

translation.en: So I decided to drive over to my ex-wife Ashley's house,
to invite her and the kids to join me.
Ashley! [screaming]
Marlon, get out!
[cow bell ringing] [Marlon] Marley!
Why are you my dad?
[Marlon] Surprise!
Marley, Zack! What the...
[Zack] Hey, Mom.
Check out the fort. Do you like it?
It's... it's amazing.
It was Dad's idea.
Pretty cool, huh?
It's super cool.
And you used my expensive sheets.
You wanna see inside, Mom?
I would love to. Thank you.
-Hold up. -Hold up.
[both] What's the password?
[Zack] Here's the hint.
What do Dad and I love more than anything in the world?
translation.ko: 아빠와 내가 가장 사랑하는 게 뭘까요?

translation.en: Farts.
-Oh, she's good! -She knows us so well!
That's a good guess, but that's not it.
What's the one thing in the world that the kids and I cannot live without?
translation.ko: 나와 애들은 이거 없이 못 사는데 그게 뭘까?

translation.en: Wait. Marley's in there?
I'm in the library. Can you please keep it down?
Come on, Ash. Guess the password.
-I don't know the password. -[Marlon] Come on.
And I have to put these groceries down. [Marlon grunting]
All right. Hey.
You fortify the ceiling in the rumpus room.
And don't use the toilet yet, okay?
-[Ashley] Marlon? -[Marlon] Hey.
Why is it that the really big, disruptive projects
always happen at my house?
Well, for one thing, I only got one set of sheets.
translation.ko: 일단 우리 집에는 시트가 한 세트밖에 없고

translation.en: You don't want to use those.
[Marlon] Here, hold this.
Now, I want you to smile. Act like you like it.
-One, two, three, say, "cheese." -Cheese!
-Okay. -Okay, so...
What did we just sell?
We just sold Paco's Alcohol-Free Tequila.
-Alcohol-free booze? -Yeah.
-What's the point? -Yeah, I know, right?
I like making bad decisions.
All I know is they're paying me to heighten the awareness to the brand.
So, are you going to stay for dinner?
Let me see.
Stay here and have a nice home-cooked meal with you and the kids,
or go home and listen to Stevie tell me the scientific reasons
translation.ko: 아니면 집에 가서 스티비한테 '워킹 데드'가 왜 비현실적인지 과학적 이유를 들을까?

translation.en: why The Walking Dead could never happen?
translation.ko: '워킹 데드'가 왜 비현실적인지 과학적 이유를 들을까?

translation.en: Yeah, I think I'll stay here.
[Ashley] All right.
Did you talk to Marley about our meeting with Miss Frye?
translation.ko: 프라이 선생님 만났다는 얘기 말리한테 했어?

translation.en: No.
You said never to parent when you are not in the room.
translation.ko: 당신이 없을 때는 부모 노릇 하지 말라며

translation.en: -Marlon? -Huh?
Where's the coffee maker?
It's in the fort.
We're opening a Starbucks behind the recliner.
Hey, make your mama a non-fat mocha latte with Frappuccino!
translation.ko: 엄마는 무지방 모카 라테 프라푸치노로 줘!

translation.en: Extra Stevia, please, and almond milk.
translation.ko: 천연 감미료 넣고 아몬드 우유로 부탁해

translation.en: Ash, this fort is gonna be lit.
There's gonna be a VIP section, we're gonna have a DJ,
we are gonna get a bouncer
to keep out all the gold-digging psychos that can't get liquor.
translation.ko: 꽃뱀이 농구팀에 접근 못 하게 할 거야

translation.en: Looks like we're gonna need that bouncer a lot quicker than I thought.
-Marlon. -Yvette.
I thought you divorced him.
He's here more now than when you were married.
translation.ko: 어째 결혼했을 때보다 더 자주 보이네

translation.en: [Marlon] Oh, this should be good. Marriage advice,
from a girl whose longest relationship was All-Star weekend.
translation.ko: 가장 길게 사귄 게 주말 농구 축제 기간이었던가?

translation.en: See. [chuckles]
-That was the old Yvette. -Mm?
I have a long-term boyfriend now,
translation.ko: 지금 애인하고는 만난 지 꽤 됐어

translation.en: and his name is God.
I hope he got some penicillin.
-Um, excuse me, I'm celibate. -[Marlon] Yeah?
Yeah, well, you "sell-a-bit" of that to somebody else.
translation.ko: 간은 다 봐 놓고 왜 이러실까

translation.en: [Ashley] Hey, hey, hey!
Come on, now. Yvette, did you bring the shoes?
-Girl, you know I brought the shoes. -[Ashley] Yes!
Hold on. No, wait, wait. What's with the shoes? [Yvette] Oh.
Ashley's got plans tomorrow night.
Uh-uh. No. [clears throat]
Ashley, I made family plans tomorrow night.
translation.ko: 애슐리는 내일 가족과 밤을 보낼 거야

translation.en: I got me, you, and the kids tickets to see the new horror movie Slaughter Camp.
translation.ko: 우리랑 애들 것까지 '대학살 캠프' 표를 예매했어

translation.en: Oh, well, Marlon, I wish you would've told me sooner. I have plans tomorrow night.
translation.ko: 진작 말하지 나 내일 밤에 약속 있어

translation.en: -Well, cancel them. -She can't cancel them.
She's right, Marlon.
Come on. What plans you all got? What you all gonna do?
Stand outside of a club watching all the 21-year-olds get in
translation.ko: 둘이 클럽 앞에서 노점상 음식이나 먹으면서

translation.en: while you all sit there, ashy, eating street meat?
Is that more important than spending quality time with your family?
translation.ko: 가족과의 뜻깊은 시간보다 더 중요한 일이야?

translation.en: [Zack] Dad!
I used the fort toilet.
Oh, son!
Come on, that is your momma's Crock-Pot!
See?
That proves that you need a night out.
Yeah, but he made family plans to see Slaughter Camp.
It ain't always about Marlon.
Girl, you're the one who ended this marriage.
Why are you acting like you're still married?
Well, you know, maybe if you ever get married and have children one day, you'd understand.
translation.ko: 너도 결혼하고 애를 낳아 보면 알 거야

translation.en: So, now, you're throwing shade?
God ain't ready for that just yet.
What's up, people?
You know, what goes great with spaghetti?
Paco's Alcohol-Free Tequila, and the babies love it, too.
Ain't that right, son?
Thanks for the margarita, Dad.
Marlon, you cannot post a video of a child drinking a margarita.
translation.ko: 말런, 애가 술 마시는 영상을 인터넷에 올리면 되겠어?

translation.en: You can if it's alcohol-free.
Drink up, son.
-Choke, choke, choke! -[Ashley] Okay!
-Turn up! Turn up! Turn up! -Okay, stop, stop!
Okay! I think it's time we put our phones away.
Marley.
Daddy and I need to talk to you.
Oh, Marley's in trouble!
This is new. [chuckles]
No one is in trouble, Zack. Okay?
translation.ko: 아무도 사고 같은 거 안 쳤어, 잭

translation.en: Marley, we sat with your counselor today.
translation.ko: 말리, 오늘 네 상담 선생님을 만났어

translation.en: She said that you seem a bit withdrawn,
translation.ko: 네가 말을 잘 안 하고 조용하다는데

translation.en: and we just wanna make sure that you're okay.
Okay.
There're these girls at school, Tiffany and Claire.
translation.ko: 학교 애들 중에 티퍼니랑 클레어라고 있는데

translation.en: They tweeted that I was a nerd just because I told Miss Perkins
translation.ko: SNS에서 날 범생이라고 놀렸어요 난 청소년 문학이 좋다고 했을 뿐인데요

translation.en: I had a passion for young adult literature.
translation.ko: 난 청소년 문학이 좋다고 했을 뿐인데요

translation.en: That is very nerdy behavior.
[Marlon] Wait. Hold up.
You're being bullied?
But you go to an all-white private school.
translation.ko: 근데 네 학교는 백인 전용 사립이잖아

translation.en: What does that mean, Marlon?
She's black.
If this was Charlie Brown, she's Franklin.
Black girls can't get bullied by little white girls.
translation.ko: 백인 여자애는 흑인 꼬마를 놀릴 수 없어

translation.en: Listen, white people are genetically predisposed to fear black people.
-Marley... -Google it!
Okay.
Marley, just talk to the girls.
You tell them bullying is wrong.
translation.ko: 친구를 괴롭히는 건 나쁜 짓이라고 말해

translation.en: What in The Brady Bunch are you talking about?
translation.ko: 이게 무슨 귀신 씻나락 까먹는 소리야?

translation.en: No, Marley. Listen to Daddy, okay?
If them girls step to you, you just gotta act a little ghetto.
translation.ko: 걔들이 시비 걸면 네가 얼마나 거친지 보여 줘

translation.en: [Marlon] You know what I'm saying?
If they come at you, you gotta be like, "Oh, hell no! Oh, hell no!
translation.ko: 걔들이 덤비면 이렇게 해 '아니, 망할 못 알아듣냐?'

translation.en: I know you ain't! I know you ain't!
This is what I wanted you to do!
This is what I wanted you to do!"
Then you got to pull out your Vaseline,
start putting Vaseline on your face,
start braiding your hair just like you mean business.
translation.ko: 머리를 넘겨서 진지하다는 걸 보여 줘

translation.en: Then after that, I want you to go, "No, it's all peace. It's all peace.
It's all good. We good."
Then I just want you to walk away, and then you go,
translation.ko: 그렇게 가는 척하다가 확 뒤도는 거야

translation.en: "I lied, bitches! You're gonna get it!
You don't know me! I don't know me!
My momma doesn't know me, and I came out of her!"
Then I want you to get clapping on them,
"No, I told you, you better leave me alone!
I am not the one!"
You do that, I guarantee you they're gonna take off running,
translation.ko: 이렇게 하면 그 애들 기겁해서 튀고

translation.en: and they're never gonna mess with you again, okay?
-Marley. -[Marley] Mm-hm?
Please ignore Daddy's advice.
Baby girl, trust me.
If you "black up," they're going to back up.
Now, let us pray.
[Stevie] Marlon.
Your cable's broken.
The only channel you're getting is the Oprah Winfrey Network.
If I have to watch another Tyler Perry movie,
I may become a racist.
Stevie, you asked to crash on my couch for two weeks.
Brother,
it's been two years!
Oh, is that all you remember about our past?
translation.ko: 넌 그런 것밖에 기억 안 나냐?

translation.en: -Do you not recall that it was me, Stevie, -Oh, god.
who told you to post your first video to YouTube?
translation.ko: 영상을 유튜브에 올려 보라고 한 건?

translation.en: Okay, okay, you might've been instrumental in the launching of my career.
translation.ko: 그래, 이 일을 시작하는 데 네가 영감을 주긴 했지

translation.en: "Instrumental?" "Instrumental."
I'm the wind beneath your wings, bitch.
"Bitch?"
I was using your misogynistic vernacular to drive home my point.
translation.ko: 네 여성 혐오적 단어로 내 주장을 관철한 거야

translation.en: Well, let me drive home my point.
Get a job, bitch.
Marlon, if I may, you're being a bit more aggressive than usual.
translation.ko: 말런, 평소보다 더 과격한 것 같은데

translation.en: Is there anything you wanna share with me?
All right.
For the first time ever,
Ashley's bailing on family plans.
translation.ko: 애슐리가 가족 모임 대신 딴 약속에 가

translation.en: She would've loved Slaughter Camp.
I mean, the fun of watching a horror movie
is watching her scream at the top of her lungs.
translation.ko: 애슐리가 고래고래 소리 지르는 게 공포 영화의 묘미거든

translation.en: "Don't go in there!"
I love that!
That's frustrating.
You know what might make you feel better?
You moving your broke ass off my couch?
No, that's not what you want. [chuckles]
You wanna take me to Slaughter Camp instead.
I'll scream louder than Ashley.
Okay, deal.
But you gotta change your shirt first.
What's wrong with this shirt?
It's mine.
I guess I have to change my underwear, too.
Marlon, this is the fifth message that I have left for you.
translation.ko: 말런, 벌써 다섯 번째 남기는 메시지야

translation.en: It's almost seven o'clock.
And I know any minute you are gonna walk in here, and you are gonna say...
I'm sorry I'm late,
but I have a really good excuse.
Really? What is it?
Uh, actually, I thought you'd say,
"I don't wanna hear no excuses."
So, I didn't come up with any.
That's what I thought. Okay, kids, time to go.
translation.ko: 그럴 줄 알았어 얘들아, 갈 시간이야

translation.en: -Hi, Stevie. Bye, Stevie. -Kids! Hey!
[Ashley] Have fun at Slaughter Camp!
Hey, you guys ready to see Uncle Stevie scream like a girl?
translation.ko: 스티비 아저씨가 여자애처럼 비명 지르는 거 볼래?

translation.en: Hey, hey. Where you going?
So, Ashley's cool with you building forts in the middle of her house?
translation.ko: 집 안에 이런 거 만들어도 애슐리가 괜찮대?

translation.en: Dude, Ashley's cool with everything.
If she's so cool, why don't you guys get back together?
translation.ko: 그렇게 잘 받아 주는데 왜 다시 안 합쳐?

translation.en: No, we're better off separated.
Look, my life is perfect.
I get to do my things with the ladies,
I get to hang with Ashley and the kids,
I get to have my cake and eat it, too.
translation.ko: 두 마리 토끼를 잡을 수 있잖아

translation.en: I wouldn't change a damn thing.
Hi.
I'm here to pick up Ashley.
Oh, hell no!
Hell no!
Hell no!
Hell to the no!
-Are you done? -Hell no.
I don't have time for this.
You know what? It's them shoes.
I should've known something was up when I've seen them shoes.
translation.ko: 신발을 봤을 때 딱 눈치챘어야 했는데

translation.en: See, those are ho shoes.
They're Yvette's.
Exactly.
You know, I can't believe you lied to me.
Liar.
You really wanna talk about lying in this relationship?
translation.ko: 우리 관계에서 거짓말에 관해 논해 볼까?

translation.en: Oh, damn, woman. Why you got to live in the past? Move on.
translation.ko: 이 여자야 과거에 집착 좀 하지 마

translation.en: And you could've told me you were going on a date.
You know what? This is not easy for me, okay?
translation.ko: 그거 알아? 나도 큰 용기를 낸 거야

translation.en: I haven't been on a date since 1998.
Who the hell did you go on a date with in 1998?
You, idiot!
You're the last person I was on a date with.
Was that the Dru Hill concert without Sisqó?
Can we please be adults about this?
Adult? Wait, I'm being an adult, okay?
This... This is not about me.
This is about our children, okay?
This is about you wanting to go out with Sexy Simon,
instead of spending quality family time with your kids.
You know, this the type of stuff that makes 'em grow up to be strippers.
And I'm not talking about good strippers,
you know, the flexible ones that know how to clap their booty.
translation.ko: 엉덩이를 흔들어 젖히는 건 양호한 편이지만

translation.en: I'm talking about the little lazy ones
that just stand by the pole, smacking their gum like,
translation.ko: 봉에 붙어 있는 애들처럼 되면 어떡해

translation.en: "Hi, hi."
Do you want that for our son?
Seriously, Ash, seeing their mother with another man?
That could be traumatic for them.
That could lead to serious depression.
They really wanna show me the fort.
He doesn't even know the password.
This is a really beautiful restaurant, Devon.
-For a beautiful woman. -Thank you.
So your ex-husband, were you two together for a long time?
We met in college.
Well, I was in college,
and he was pretending to go to college to meet girls.
translation.ko: 그 사람은 여자를 꾀려고 대학생인 척했죠

translation.en: But, you know what? I really don't want to talk about my ex.
translation.ko: 내 전남편 얘기는 하고 싶지 않아요

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid we might have to.
Why is that?
Because he's here.
What the what?
That's crazy!
You know, I was out getting some frozen yogurt for the kids,
translation.ko: 애들 주려고 얼린 요구르트를 사러 나왔다가

translation.en: and I looked in the window, I said, "Hey! That looks like Ashley and David."
-It's Devon. -Is it?
Marlon, why aren't you at the movies?
You know, I really wasn't digging Slaughter Camp.
I couldn't feel sorry for those dumbass teenagers partying in the woods.
You know, at a point, I just started rooting for the killer.
Well, it was nice to see you.
-Okay, I'm sorry. -Yeah.
-I'mma jet. -Okay.
-Yes. -You guys get back to your little date.
-Hey, good seeing you, Dennis. -Devon.
Mm-hm.
-I'm so sorry. -I've already forgotten about him.
So Yvette tells me you're a great designer.
-I would love to hear more... -Real quick.
While I'm here, I should tell you about the trash cans.
translation.ko: 이왕 온 김에 휴지통 얘기 좀 할게

translation.en: I got a letter from the city.
They are gonna start picking up the trash cans on Thursdays
-instead of Tuesdays, so... -Well, you know what?
translation.ko: 화요일 말고 목요일에 쓰레기를 수거... 이런 얘기는 나중에 해도 되지 않을까?

translation.en: I'm sure that we can talk about this later.
translation.ko: 이런 얘기는 나중에 해도 되지 않을까?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, and I... And I hear you, but you know,
you just don't wanna leave garbage cans out.
God forbid, one of our kids get mauled by a bear!
translation.ko: 곰이 우리 애를 공격할까 봐 무섭지 않아?

translation.en: I saw The Revenant,
and bear gonna do that to Leonardo DiCaprio,
imagine what it's gonna do to our son's little black ass.
[Marlon] But, your date is more important than him,
the potential death of our son.
-Give us a second, Jeff. -It's Devon.
[Ashley] Marlon,
why are you here?
Because I did some research on the Internet,
and I dug up some dirt on your boy Devon over there.
translation.ko: 저 데번이라는 놈 뒤가 아주 구리더라고

translation.en: -What did you find out, Marlon? -Well, I'm glad you asked.
In spite of his pretty face and those almond-shaped eyes,
translation.ko: 저 반반한 얼굴과 아몬드형 눈에 속지 마

translation.en: his Equifax history shows a delinquent payment
to the gas company in June of 2003.
[Ashley] What?
It starts with one late payment, then it's a slippery slope from there.
Is there a problem?
No, it ain't no problem, brother.
Unless you're the gas company, and people try to take advantage of you.
translation.ko: 사람들이 가스 회사에 연체만 안 하면요

translation.en: Pardon me, sir, but I'm gonna have to ask you to leave.
You're not dining with us this evening, and you're clearly disrupting our guests.
translation.ko: 식사도 안 하면서 손님들을 방해하고 있잖아요

translation.en: Oh, really? Is that the reason?
Or is it because I'm black?
[manager] No! God, no.
He's black, and we're not asking him to leave.
translation.ko: 이분도 흑인인데 나가라는 말 안 했잖아요

translation.en: Oh, wait! Oh, you're gonna call your boys...
You're going to call your boys on me?
Ya'll going to make me act ghetto!
This is what I wanted you to do! Oh! [camera clicks]
So you better ask yourself real fast, do you really wanna do this?
translation.ko: 머리 잘 굴려 진짜 이런 식으로 나올 거야?

translation.en: I'mma talk to your nipples.
Do you really want to do this?
Oh, oh, god, I can't wait!
See, that's why I carry my Vaseline around.
Oh, man, I ran out.
Hey, brother, do you mind if I use some of that?
Thank you very much.
That's it! Ya'll about to get it!
I'mma drag my nails on the ground!
I'mma to sharpen my nails on the ground!
I get in that 45-degree angle, be like, [camera clicks]
"Oh, how I hit him from there?" Because you can't.
translation.ko: '저 자식을 어떻게 패지?' 넌 못할 거야

translation.en: And I'll do slip and slap, slip and slap!
translation.ko: 내가 빠지고 치고 빠지고 칠 거니까

translation.en: [Marlon] Oh, we are going to get violent?
What you gonna do? What you gonna do!
Oh, that's what you gonna do. Okay, bye, guys.
Marlon?
[Marlon] Yeah?
Can I come in?
[Marlon] What's the password?
Can we please not do this right now?
[Marlon] What's the one thing in the world the kids and I cannot live without?
translation.ko: 나와 애들은 이거 없이 못 사는데 그게 뭘까?

translation.en: I am not in the mood for this.
[Marlon] What is the one thing in this world
translation.ko: 나와 애들은 이거 없이 못 사는데

translation.en: the kids and I cannot live without?
Me?
[Marlon] You may enter.
What happened tonight, Marlon?
Look, I don't know.
I panicked, I guess.
Over one date?
You've been on hundreds of dates since we separated.
translation.ko: 당신은 이혼하고 데이트를 수도 없이 했잖아

translation.en: You don't see me panicking.
That's cause you know, no matter how many women I date,
I'm never gonna find anybody as good as you.
translation.ko: 자기만 한 사람이 없다는 걸 알잖아

translation.en: When I saw that dude with you and the kids...
translation.ko: 당신과 애들이 그 자식이랑 있는 걸 보고

translation.en: I just got scared.
I got scared he's gonna take my place.
And I know this is a strange thing to say to your ex-wife...
translation.ko: 이혼한 사이에 이런 말 하기 좀 그렇지만

translation.en: I'm just afraid to lose you.
You're never gonna lose me.
Hey, we're a family.
My babies, they have your eyes.
Devon can't touch that.
I wish they had his eyes.
They're magnificent.
I heightened the awareness of the brand. [chuckling continues]
You're gonna get your boys on me?
I'm Tarzan, bitch!
You want none of this Spider-Man!
Webs swinging in your face!
Mind your business! I go incognito.
translation.ko: 나한테 신경 꺼 난 위장 중이라고

translation.en: [man] If this gentleman had drunk Paco's Alcohol-Free Tequila,
none of this would have happened.
Oh, that's what you gonna do. Okay.
What if we lied to him and said we were meeting
-a half hour earlier? -It doesn't work, trust me.
translation.ko: 약속 시간을 30분 전으로 속이면 어떨까요? 소용없어요, 장담해요

translation.en: Sorry I'm late.
I was gonna be here on time, but then I realized at the last minute,
I'm incapable of that.
Hey, baby girl.
[smooches] [Miss Frye] Mr. and Mrs. Wayne,
your daughter Marley said some things in the cafeteria this afternoon
that were racially charged and politically incorrect.
What did... What did she say?
She paraded around the cafeteria clapping her hands,
and threatening Tiffany and Claire,
saying, and I quote,
"Oh, hell no!
Ya'll gonna make me go ghetto.
You don't know me. [Miss Frye] My momma don't know me.
translation.ko: '넌 날 몰라 우리 엄마도 날 몰라'

translation.en: Hell no. Hell no."
And there were a lot more "hell nos."
